mapper.select: select document_seq, write_date, emer_yn, title, status, name from ( select document_seq, write_date, emer_yn, title, status, docu_code from documents where status = #{status} and emp_no = #{empNo} order by write_date desc ) d join document_list dl ON d.docu_code = dl.docu_code where ROWNUM <= 5
select * from document_list
mapper.insert:
select document_seq.currval from dual
insert into documents values (document_seq.nextval, #{emp_no}, #{title}, sysdate, null, #{status}, #{emer_yn}, #{docu_code})
mapper.select: select * from documents where document_seq = #{docuSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into approvals_line values (a_line_seq.nextval, #{document_seq}, #{emp_no}, null, #{status}, #{approval_order}, null)
mapper.select: select a.*, name, role_title from approvals_line a join employee e on a.emp_no = e.emp_no join role r on e.role_code = r.role_code where document_seq = ${docuSeq} order by a.approval_order
select * from reference_line where document_seq = #{docuSeq}
select * from work_proposals where document_seq = #{docuSeq}
select * from lateness_reports where document_seq = #{docuSeq}
select * from leave_requests where document_seq = #{docuSeq}

select count(*) from documents d join document_list dl on d.docu_code = dl.docu_code join approvals_line a on d.document_seq = a.document_seq where
d.docu_code = #{docuCode} and
d.status = '진행중' and approval_order = 3 and d.document_seq in (select document_seq from approvals_line where emp_no = #{empNo} and status = #{status})

select * from ( select d.document_seq document_seq, write_date, name, emer_yn, title, d.emp_no emp_no, a.emp_no last_appr, row_number() over (order by write_date desc, emer_yn desc) as rn from documents d join document_list dl on d.docu_code = dl.docu_code join approvals_line a on d.document_seq = a.document_seq where
d.docu_code = #{docuCode} and
d.status = '진행중' and approval_order = 3 and d.document_seq in (select document_seq from approvals_line where emp_no = #{empNo} and status = #{status}) ) where rn between (#{cPage} * #{recordCountPerPage} - (#{recordCountPerPage} - 1)) AND (#{cPage} * #{recordCountPerPage})

select count(*) from documents d join document_list dl on d.docu_code = dl.docu_code join approvals_line a on d.document_seq = a.document_seq where a.approval_order = 3 and d.status != '임시 저장' and d.emp_no = #{empNo}
and d.docu_code = #{docuCode}

and d.docu_code = #{docuCode}
mapper.update: update documents set title = #{title}, emer_yn = #{emer_yn}, status = #{status}, write_date = sysdate where document_seq = #{document_seq}
update work_proposals set eff_date = #{eff_date}, dept_title = #{dept_title}, contents = #{contents} where document_seq = #{document_seq}
update lateness_reports set late_date = #{late_date}, reason = #{reason} where document_seq = #{document_seq}
update approvals_line set comments = #{comments}, status = '결재 완료', approved_date = sysdate where document_seq = #{document_seq} and emp_no = #{emp_no}
update approvals_line set status = '결재 완료', approved_date = sysdate where document_seq = #{docuSeq} and approval_order > #{order}
update documents set status = #{status}, done_date = sysdate where document_seq = #{docuSeq}
